name: NodeRSSBot
description: Another Telegram RSSBot but in Node.js Telegram RSS 机器人

DATABASE_URL.description: connection string of other c/s dbms

RSSBOT_LANG.description: default language for new user, fall back language for string without a corresponding translation

RSSBOT_ITEM_NUM.description: Send up to `item_num` messages at a time

RSSBOT_FETCH_GAP.description: fetch_gap can be set in how many minutes or hours. m for minute, h for hour for example, 5m means every 5 minutes, 1h means every 1 hour.

NOTIFY_ERR_COUNT.description: How many consecutive errors in one feed will a warning be issued

RSSBOT_UA.description: user-agent header of the bot , version in default value is fetch from pacakge.json

RSSBOT_CONCURRENCY.description: how many concurrency requests will be send in a batch

RSSBOT_ALLOW_LIST.description: allow list by user id splited by comma. You can get your userid by @userinfobot or @getidsbot
